sm::SimpleStateMachine< container_class, return_type, args > Class Template Reference

Documentation

template<class container_class, typename return_type, typename... args>
class sm::SimpleStateMachine< container_class, return_type, args >

This class implements a simple state machine. The state machine will execute a method based on the state.

Public Types

typedef return_type(container_class::* state_method_t) (args...)
 

Public Member Functions

u32 count () const
 
int error () const
 
bool is_state_valid () const

return_type update (args...arguments)
 

Member Typedef Documentation

template<class container_class , typename return_type , typename... args>
typedef return_type(container_class::* sm::SimpleStateMachine< container_class, return_type, args >::state_method_t) (args...)

Defines the method type to execute with each state.

Member Function Documentation

template<class container_class , typename return_type , typename... args>
u32 sm::SimpleStateMachine< container_class, return_type, args >::count ( ) const
inline

Returns the total number of states currently registered with the state machine.

template<class container_class , typename return_type , typename... args>
int sm::SimpleStateMachine< container_class, return_type, args >::error ( ) const
inline

Returns the current error value.

template<class container_class , typename return_type , typename... args>
bool sm::SimpleStateMachine< container_class, return_type, args >::is_state_valid ( ) const
inline

Returns true if the current state is valid.

template<class container_class , typename return_type , typename... args>
void sm::SimpleStateMachine< container_class, return_type, args >::set_state_method ( u32  state,
state_method_t  method 
)
inline

Sets the method associated with the state.

template<class container_class , typename return_type , typename... args>
u32 sm::SimpleStateMachine< container_class, return_type, args >::state ( ) const
inline

Returns the currently active state.

template<class container_class , typename return_type , typename... args>
return_type sm::SimpleStateMachine< container_class, return_type, args >::update ( args...  arguments)
inline

Updates the state machine.

This class is designed to be used within another loop. This method should be called periodically.
